fmt.#desc: Format json                 Uasge: normalize json data | jo fmt

color.#desc: Format json with color      Uasge: normalize json data | jo color

l|list.#desc: Generate json list          Uasge: jo list [argument...]

d|dict.#desc: Generate json dict          Uasge: jo dict [argument...]

qu.#desc: Query json data             Uasge: json data | jo qu [path] [argument...]

env.#dsc: Get environment variables;  Uasge: json data | jo env [path] [argument...]
